snippet: Venezuelans showed overwhelming support for President Hugo Chávez’s party in elections for governor on Sunday, giving it control over almost all of the nation’s 23 states.
abstract: Venezuelans show overwhelming support for President Hugo Chavez’s party in elections for governor on Sunday, giving it control over almost all of the nation’s 23 states; candidates loyal to Chavez, who is cancer-stricken and potentially unable to continue in office, win in at least 19 states.
lead_paragraph: Venezuelans showed overwhelming support for President Hugo Chávez’s party in elections for governor on Sunday, giving it control over almost all of the nation’s 23 states.

headline.main: Chávez Party Wins Vote Amid Uncertainty
headline.print_headline: Chávez Party Wins Vote Amid Uncertainty
